definition: Lei Feng (1940-1962), made into a model of altruism and dedication to the Party by propaganda from 1963 onwards
point of a spear/edge of a tool/vanguard/forward (in sports team)
selfless model citizen, just like Lei Feng 雷鋒|雷锋[Lei2 Feng1]

sentences.english: It was very nice that the drivers called us "little Lei Feng"
sentences.chinese: 最讓人高興的是，司機叔叔稱我們是小雷鋒。

sentences.english: I finally reach Leifeng, the entry fee a bargain 40 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 最後我來到雷鋒塔，門票很便宜，只要40元。

sentences.english: Lei was orphaned at 7 years old.
We should learn from Comrade Lei Feng.
Leifeng was known as a pattern that offered help to others selflessly.
sentences.chinese: 雷鋒被稱爲一個模式，提供了無私地幫助別人。

sentences.english: He is a second Lei Feng.
There are many Lei Fengs in PLA.
sentences.chinese: 解放軍裏有許多雷鋒式人物。

sentences.english: It is Comrade Lei Feng that (who) we are learning from.
sentences.chinese: 咱們正在學習的是雷鋒同道。

sentences.english: Each of the students wanted to be a live Lei Feng.
sentences.chinese: 每位學生都想成爲活雷鋒。

sentences.english: He is a man of Lei Feng type.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個雷鋒式的人物。

sentences.english: Lei Feng is a brilliant example for us to learn from. ( to learn from the example)
sentences.chinese: 雷鋒是我們學習的光輝榜樣。

sentences.english: Do you remember Leifeng? Today is the memorial day of learning from Leifeng.
sentences.chinese: 還記得雷鋒嗎？今天是學習雷鋒同志紀念日。

sentences.english: Do you remember Leifeng? Today is the memorial day of learning from Leifeng.
sentences.chinese: 還記得雷鋒嗎？今天是學習雷鋒同志紀念日。

sentences.english: Lei Feng never waited for thanks.
sentences.chinese: 雷鋒從來不要別人向他道謝。

sentences.english: Have you ever learnt about Leifeng?
Leifeng is a good soldier, who served the people all his life.
sentences.chinese: 雷鋒是個好同志，他一生都在爲人民服務。

definition: Serve the People!, CCP political slogan
the tone of a school/campus atmosphere
Deng Xiaoping (1904-1997), Chinese communist leader, de facto leader of PRC 1978-1990 and creator of "socialism with Chinese characteristics"
